phrases: From the bottom of my heart, I felt she was the one.
Did you have to introduce me like that?
I was training to be a priest until last week, you see.
Look at the time...hhhhhhhhh Sorry, I am gettinghhhhhhhhhh sleepy.
I am sorry forhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh keeping you up!hhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh Goodnight!
I am sorry forhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh keeping you up!hhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh Goodnight!
If you are free over the weekend, would you likehhhh to go on a date?hhhhhhhhh
If you are free over the weekend, would you likehhhh to go on a date?hhhhhhhhh
I am freehhhh on Sunday!hhhhhhhh Let us go!hhhh
I know I am not used to going on dates and stuff.
Like I said, I have never had a girlfriend before.
It is the same for me.
I had two relationships in high school, but they both ended almost immediately.
I am not that great with boys, really.
We are both sailing in the same leaky boat.
I am going to be there for her.
I am going to make her happy... for life.
I had lots of fun today.
I could not control myself anymore.
When hwill hhyou hhhget hhhhhere hhhhh?
When hwill hhyou hhhget hhhhhere hhhhh?
If you do not hurry up
I will charge you for an extension
Who does that girl think she is?
And that stupid virgin's pissing hme off, too!
Not like they will last more than three months, anyway

Receipt Kinoshita Kazuya-sama Rent-A-Girlfriend Itemized Bill Base Fee/hrhhhhhh 5000 yen x1 hChoice Fee (Rookie)hhhhhhhhh5000 yen x1 hhCosts (City Limits)hhhhhhhhhhhh2000 yen x1 Total: 12,000 yen + taxes
Act normally when we are with the others, okay?
Hey, your face looks a bit flushed.
Oh, I am just feeling kind of warm.
I could not control myself anymore.
Like hell I could forget that!
Does not that mean she likes me?!
It looked like it was all over when Mizuhara showed up,
but what if it only fanned Mami-chan's flames even more?
Let us pick up where we left off.
Not even in death shall we part.
Ugh, I might really be coming down with a cold.
I spent 30,000 yen on the gacha, too!
Kinoshita-san, please do not use a tablet holder on your bed table...
I am going to be discharged next week.
All the tests are finally done.
Now I can come see Chizuru whenever I want.
I am glad it was not anything major.
I have been deceiving Gran all this time.
It is probably in a neighborhood full of mansions, too.
I would want to see that.
I-It is pretty far away, though.
Where in Tokyo do you live?
Or, like, a fancy standalone house?
Why do not we all hang out at her place when we get back?
You are putting her on the spot.
You think it is a good idea, right, Kazuya?
Sorry I have been lying to you, Gran!
But I will introduce you to my real girlfriend soon!
This fake relationship with Mizuhara ends now.
Chizuru and I were actually talking about breaking up.
So that is kind of an awkward question to answer.
I-I know it is not a great time to bring this up, but you know.
W-We just kind of got the blues after a while.
Well, it is between the two of you.
It is not our place to say anything.
I said I would leave my aimless rental girlfriend life here in Izu!
What is wrong with you, dude?!
Kazu-chin, you are not supposed to let your dick dictate your love life.
What makes you think you can just sock me like that?!
Now you have done it, jerk!
Your balding ass is the one that started it!
My hairline's just a little shy, is all!
Oh, it is on, you total nitwit!
I am so disappointed in you, Kazu-chin!
When did you become such a self-centered dirt bag?!
Do not think I have not noticed you fawning over Mami-chan!
I bet Chizuru-san just dumped you because you are being so wishy-washy!
Yes, your brain's a dumpster fire, but at least make it burn for your current flame!
If you cannot treat the girl who chose to be with you right, you are a lost because!
You have no idea how much I liked Mami-chan,
or how hurt I was when she dumped me!
Could you stop leading on a guy you dumped?
Chizuru-san, you should probably leave for the day.
If you cannot treat the girl who chose to be with you right, you are a lost because!
They do not know the full story.
Of course they do not get it.
I will make a booking for next week.
Just tell the agency we went to eat sashimi in Shimoda or something.
We do not need to go visit her every Wednesday anymore.
My grandmom's getting discharged next week, too.
So it is the perfect time to end this.
It will not take people long to forget that we were ever a thing.
That was a pathetic display I put on back there, huh?
I feel bad about just how much trouble I have caused you.
Hey, you came clean about the breakup.
That is step one toward moving on.
No matter what the others made of it,
I saw it as a bold move.
I guess you can be a man if you try.
Can I keep these sandals as a gift?
It must have sucked for you, huh?
Having to play the girlfriend of trash like me.
And all my stuff's still in the restroom there...
Do you have time to chat?
She showed up at noon, so two hours?
Add to that the train fare to Shimoda...
This always burns a hole in my wallet.
But given all I put her through, even twice that would not make up for it.
Who punches a guy before getting the full story?
Just how undeserving does he think I am of Mizuhara?!
Well, I did show her off to him a lot.
You reap what you sow, I guess.
You should know there is no way Mizuhara would go out with me for real.
You just do not get it, man.
What are they doing by themselves?
And things seem kind of awkward!
Lives by the motto of Every cutie is probably taken anyway, so might as well go for broke.
Wait, is he asking her out?
Are you and Kazuya really breaking up?
I have known him since we were kids.
I have watched him his entire life, including what a flop he is with the ladies.
Well, I almost gave up on him when he got rejected three times in one month, though.
By the same girl, no less.
So I honestly could not believe my eyes when he showed up with a cutie like you.
He is trash, is not he?
He is a wishy-washy moron who always needs others to clean up his messes,
but he still believes everything will work out for him.
But sometimes, I think it is a real talent to be so stupidly optimistic.
our class was growing morning glories over the summer.
But I knocked his planter over by accident.
I could not tell where the seeds had flown off to.
I just grabbed the dirt lying around and put it back.
It was clearly just a weed,
but he was adamant that it was a morning glory.
The teacher tried to stop him,
but he showed up first every morning to water it.
And he even kept a journal for it.
I felt bad about the whole thing,
and decided to apologize to him once summer break ended.
Into a flower prettier than anyone else's.
It was a rare flower called Hibiscus t-something-num.
It won him the gold medal in our research project.
He was sad because it was not a morning glory,
The heck kind of flower is this?!
but I was mad jealous of that flower.
It never would have bloomed if he would given up and stopped watering the plant.
Reality's always out to grind us down.
the neighborhood strays always poop by your front door,
the manga you love goes out with a whimper, and stuff.
When you let reality win and stop dreaming, you die inside.
When you stood up for Kazu-chin at the pub,
I thought he would finally found someone who noticed his positives.
I do not know what happened between the two of you...
but if you have just grown sick of him being a dumbass,
could you give him another chance?
If he ever pisses you off, I will beat him up for you.
He is not a bad guy, honestly.
In the end, I know he will make sure you do not regret it.
I bought these at the convenience store.
I figured you two needed some alone time.
Oh, I could not possibly accept them!
Let me do this for you.
My best bud landed the best girl, but I would done nothing to congratulate you two.
I am sorry I hit you earlier!
Well, I will leave you two to it.
I cannot say no after that speech he gave.
If it is just us on the ferry, we will not have to worry about putting on an act.
I have been gone two hours now.
At this point, all I can do is call them and say I left because I felt sick.
But this really is the last time.
Kibe-san does not know our situation,
so he will accept it if you tell him we talked it out and decided to break up.
It will go away after a night's rest.
I am more than happy doing this to help get your story straight.
I do not want this whole thing hanging over future jobs.
I did not expect it to turn into such a big deal.
Like I said, you did nothing wrong.
You cannot get over your ex, right?
Then go get her back with all you have got.
If there is something you want, you have to go all-out to claim it for yourself.
Once I get off this ferry,
I am going to ask Mami-chan out!
I will clean up the rest of this mess myself.
I will talk to everyone and make sure they get it.
Sorry you had to do all this for us.
Why does the review scale only go up to five?
I would give you ten stars if I could!
Oh, and I will not talk to you at college.
I will try to avoid you while taking out the trash and stuff, too.
And I will not rent you anymore.
I will not rent Mizuhara Chizuru out anymore.
Sorry, could you leave me alone?
Wow, it is so loud there.
N-Not right now, but in a bit, sure.
I will be waiting here the whole time.
I am waiting all by myself.
And I will wait till you get here.
I will be there for sure.
Is she going to be okay?
It was the girl who was just here.
She was wearing a white top and had long hair.
Already a chief at her young age
I need your help with homework!
Why would you jump off like that?
It was just a natural reaction.
Why does it sound like innuendo when she says it?
Go get your lights punched out again.
It is the hot springs episode everybody's been waiting for.
Is it going to have a scene with Mizuhara and me bathing?!
Nobody wants to see you in the nude, Kazu-kun.
